description.name: phptbep20
description.tagline: PHPt bep20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto bep20-phpt Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept PHPt bep20 directly on your website
Unique bep20/phpt receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your bep20/phpt wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
